patterns_discovered: Adding aria-labels to icon buttons for improved screen reader accessibility
Button components with icon and text that benefit from additional labeling
Dynamic aria-label generation using contextual machine information
gotchas_discovered: Icon-only or icon-with-text buttons may not convey complete meaning to screen readers
Buttons performing critical actions like migration, failover, and machine control require clear descriptions
recommendations: Systematically review all icon buttons for aria-label completeness
Create a consistent naming convention for aria-labels across the application
Consider auto-generating aria-labels for more complex scenarios
Conduct accessibility testing to validate screen reader experience
